title: Players are not ready bug?
body:
I finished a game this morning and on attempting to start up another game as a solo, was met with this:

"! Players are not ready"

So I figured maybe I'd bugged the client or something so I logged out and logged back in but I'm still getting the same message every time.

It doesn't matter what game type I queue up for, I still get the same message every time. Any idea as to what's going on?
